name: On The Wind's Breath
description:
You play as a dandelion seed which floats on the wind's breath.

You must flourish into a beautiful flower, fight against the wind and take control of it.

You can only grow in fertile soil, grass won't do. 

Landing on rocks is safe, you cannot get stuck in them. 

Can you find the Easter egg?

Demo made in a week for Brackeys Game Jam 2023.1 with the theme “end is a new beginning”

Controls:

- Mouse click - Sets the direction and power of the wind.

Credits & Licensing:
